author: Emily Price
title: Betsy DeVos Visits Scene of Florida High School Shooting Amid Backlash
text:
Education Secretary Betsy DeVos faced student criticism and then abruptly walked out of her own press conference during a visit on Wednesday to the Parkland, Fla. high school where 17 died in a mass shooting last month.
Students who have been vocal about the need for gun control spoke out against DeVos in person and on Twitter. DeVos has advocated for arming teachers.
